alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 08 at 11:55AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bay County through 1230 PM EDT/1130 AM CDT/... At 1155 AM EDT/1055 AM CDT/, the public reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles north of Lynn Haven to 10 miles south of Panama City to 31 miles southwest of Tyndall Air Force Base. Movement was east at 15 mph. An Ambient weather station in Panama City Beach measured a gust to near 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, St Andrews State Park, Southport, Fountain, Allanton, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Beacon Beach, College Station, Bayou George, Camp Flowers, Gainer Spring, Biltmore Beach and Bennett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
